website_summaries.verdict: The best budget analog DJ mixer with advanced, premium features found on more expensive options.
pros: Comes with two dedicated input channels with volume and equalization control
Play back tracks with the built-in USB and MP3 player
USB and Bluetooth connectivity works with most computers and audio software
Crossfader knob is smooth to the touch
cons: Can develop a subtle hum under bright lights

customer_reviews.title: Value for inputs
customer_reviews.text: So the quick story is this mixer is ok for limited crossfader use. The crossfader feels cheap and would wear fast if seriously used . So remove a star for that .. and remove one more star for placement of the headphone and microphone jack.. on top / on both sides of the cross fader. But I give it a solid three stars for its works , has a metal construction, has Bluetooth / usb input and 4 other RCA inputs that can be controlled by a switch quickly. Really a good value priced 2 Channel mixer for light use and Cocktail hours . Really light the Bluetooth feature as well.
customer_reviews.author: Martini81

customer_reviews.title: Update 8/26 Audio quality out of master output is distorted BAD.  Idk what It is
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. A little glitchy at first with the knobs and faders switching their functions but a simple reset fixed it. Bluetooth plays your music from a Device only on right channel. They should alllow each channel imo. Then again it is a $60 mixer so no complaints. UPDATE ** Audio quality is distorted BAAAD. I used the same speakers and bypassed it directly from the device to the audio input of the same speaker and it’s crystal clear. Haven’t reached out to Rockville yet but I barely used the mixer and it has this pro problem.
customer_reviews.author: krys1sdj

customer_reviews.title: Provably acceptable for the I tended use.  BlueTooth range is limited.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Bluetooth reception mixed with another source. The BlueToorh range really is terrible for my purpose. For DJ needing to play a song from the groom's phone I'm sure it works great, but for a guest BlueTooth port by my pool it was terrible! I fixed it by replacing (through drilling, cutting, and soldering) the on-board folded F antenna with an external 2.4 GHz antenna. The range increased to the point where I could use it. Who builds a 2.4 GHz radio and puts it side a steel box? These guys did!

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it for home use!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been putting together my old turntables, and such, and this mixer works PERFECTLY for my home. I am not technically savvy, but have many "old school" albums that I wanted to inter-mix. This unit is small/compact, and does have ability to connect devices via USB, and has Bluetooth capability, but that's not my thing! Nice to know that I can though. Really great for the price. By the way....does not come with "any" cables (audio) except for the power cord!!! Shipping was incredibly fast!!!

product_meta.title: Rockville RDJ3BT 2 Channel DJ Mixer with USB, Bluetooth, Talkover, 4 Line Inputs
product_meta.description: style:with bluetoothThe Rockville RDJ3BT is a compact yet powerful DJ mixer with built in bluetooth. It has 2 channels with separate gain, bass, and treble controls. The main advantage of our mixer is that it is made with premium materials and offers extremely high quality sound. It is built extremely rugged and tough so it can withstand abuse without skipping a beat.
feature_bullets: Rockville RDJ3BT compact 2 channel DJ mixer with USB, Bluetooth, and LED display.
Selectable Inputs for channel 1 and channel 2. 2 Channels.
Adjustable high, low, and gain knobs on each channel. Mic volume control.
Channel 1/2 Cue monitor control. Individual volume control.
Master volume control. Channel 1 and 2 fader and cross fader.
Built in USB and MP3 player with LCD to play back tracks. Built in Bluetooth for hands free music playback.
Talk-over: -16dB. Distortion: ≤ 0.05%. Signal/ Noise ratio: > 80dB. 1 1/4" Mic input. 1 1/4" Headphone output.
4 RCA L/R Line inputs. 1 RCA L/R Master amp output. 1 RCA L/R Rec output.
You can ground your turntables to the mixer. Dimension: 7 x 8.85 x 2.4 inches. Weight: 3.08 lbs.
